mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-DD-MM'), INTERE, OPEN, IMAGE, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, EXTRAADDRESS, CNT, TOCNT FROM CAFE WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAFE WHERE TITLE = #{title}
SELECT OPEN FROM CAFE WHERE SEQ = #{cafe}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PREPORT (PREPNUM, POSTNUM, PREPREASON, PREPCONTEXT, PREPDATE) VALUES (PREP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{postnum}, #{prepreason}, #{prepcontext}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PRE.PREPNUM,PRE.POSTNUM,PRE.PREPREASON,PRE.PREPCONTEXT,PRE.PREPDATE FROM PREPORT PRE JOIN POST PO ON PRE.POSTNUM = PO.CODE JOIN CATEGORY CATE ON CATE.CODE = PO.CATEGORY WHERE CAFE = #{seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BFILE WHERE POSTCD = #{postcd}
